results.title: Blinky Bill production featurette
results.brief_description: Documentary capturing the production process behind the creation of a Blinky Bill animated film. Includes storyboard and cel animation, sound recording, filming live action footage, creating models, music composition and sound recording.Yoram Gross, John Palmer (writer), Frank Hammond (cinematographer), Ray Nowland (art director), Guy Gross (composer) and other crew are also featured discussing their work.

results.title: Blinky Bill (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Yoram Gross Films and Yoram Gross
results.brief_description: Blinky Bill the koala sets off to try and find his mother after their peaceful bush home is destroyed by loggers. He meets new friends and has many adventures along the way in this delightful animated film which is based on Dorothy Wall’s classic story.
results.description: Blinky Bill the koala sets off to try and find his mother after their peaceful bush home is destroyed by loggers. He meets new friends and has many adventures along the way in this delightful animated film which is based on Dorothy Wall’s classic story.

results.title: Blinkity blank
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Norman McLaren and Tom Daly
results.brief_description: A film experiment by Norman McLaren in the use of intermittent animation and spasmodic imagery. McLaren makes play with the laws relating to persistence of vision and after image on the retina of the eye. By engraving non-representational visuals directly on black, emulsion-coated films in interrupted sequence, he achieves a ‘Now you see it, now you don’t effect. The music background is in the form of semi-free instrumental improvisation, with percussive effects added by synthetic sounds scratched directly on film. (Awards: London, Cannes, Edinburgh, Berlin, Los Angeles)
results.creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Norman McLaren and Tom Daly

results.title: Blinker's spy-spotter
results.creator_credit: Harold Orton, Children's Film Foundation, Eyeline Films and Jack Stephens
results.brief_description: The story of young “Blinker” (a professor’s son) who loves gadgets of all kinds. Blinker and his frinds thwart an attempt by a rival gang of boys to steal a top secret invention of the professor’s.

results.title: Blindness
results.creator_credit: Walford Hewitson, ONF | NFB and Morten Parker
results.brief_description: The story of a man who lost his sight during the best years of his life. Filmed with the help of the Canadian National Institute for the Blind, this study of blindness tries to show the emotional effect of the sudden loss of sight and how a man so stricken climbs back from the brink of despair. How he learns a trade which enables him to support himself and eventually a family, is a story of quiet triumph convincingly portrayed. Starring Len Cariou
results.creator_credit_for_label: Walford Hewitson, ONF | NFB and Morten Parker

results.title: Blind man's bluff
results.creator_credit: Cyril Randell, Children's Film Foundation, Willis World Wide Films and Gerry O'Hara
results.brief_description: A young boy named Joe Hunter is kidnapped after his father wins 200,000 pounds in the lottery. His two young friends team up with Smithie, a blind man, and together they discover who kidnapped Joe, resulting in his rescue.

results.title: Bligh of the Bounty: world navigator
results.creator_credit: Bruce Harris, Rolf Harris Video Productions and Dennis Murphy
results.brief_description: A four-part television documentary presented by Rolf Harris, with accompanying book, about the life and journeys of Captain William Bligh. Captain of the ill-fated Bounty, Bligh was also a navigator, surveyor and explorer. The series covers the story of Captain Bligh from his birth to his death, and follows his voyages from England through the Canary Islands, the Caribbean and Canada to the South Pacific. The 112 page book ‘Mutiny on the Bounty’ presents an in-depth historical survey of the Mutiny, its causes and its consequences through essays, articles and colour illustrations.

results.title: BLEVE = Boiling liquid expansion vapourised explosion
results.creator_credit: Urban Image, National Fire Protection Association (U.S.) and Lawrence Rosenblum
results.brief_description: A fire safety and fire-fighting film about BLEVE - “Boiling Liquid Expansion Vapourised Explosion.” Includes several American newsclips dealing with large liquid petroleum gas cylinder fires.
